Overview

Our mission is to support global scientific communities with curated open-source tools, research platforms, datasets, and learning material.

Why This Wiki Exists

Modern science depends heavily on computing infrastructure, including:

  • High-performance computing (HPC)
  • Cloud environments
  • Distributed systems
  • Numerical modeling
  • Scientific data pipelines

This wiki makes it easy to find:
